name: Snake7
description:
Do you remember the times when games used to be fun? Before AAA games took over the  industry forcing us in the same 'lots of content - zero enjoyablity' cycle? Cry no more - indie developer comes to the rescue.

     Snake7 aims to be a simple recreation of the original with just a few features added. You are in charge: make it a simple relaxing game while listening to music or go super competitive and try to buffer overflow the score (ha, good luck with that).

     Main features:

  • different types of food
  • special events called 'apocalypse'
  • a softcap after which the game gets very hard
  • snake color changes based on score

     Also strategies can be used based on food and timing:  Aggressive (fast but risky), Casual (slow but safer) and everything in between. It is up to you to discover how you would like to play the game.

     Have Fun !
